title: The "Indrajaal" Diamond Vaddanam with Emerald Centrepiece
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Embellished with meticulously handset
brilliant-cut diamonds of VS clarity and GH color. Features a central
oval-cut Zambian Emerald of exceptional color saturation and clarity. The dangling accents are South Sea Pearls.
features: This Vaddanam showcases intricate filigree and floral motifs meticulously set with diamonds. The central emerald is surrounded by an elaborate diamond halo, enhancing its brilliance. The design subtly incorporates elements of traditional Nakshi work, lending a touch of antique charm while retaining a modern aesthetic. The pearl drops add a touch of grace and movement.
colors: The piece features a color palette of radiant gold
deep green from the emerald. The subtle cream color of the South Sea pearls provides a soft contrast.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other festive celebrations. Its modern design also makes it a stunning statement piece for high-end events and parties.
description: A true masterpiece of craftsmanship, this Vaddanam embodies timeless elegance and modern sophistication. The use of high-quality materials like 22K gold, VS clarity diamonds, and a Zambian emerald ensures its lasting value. Its unique design blends traditional artistry with contemporary appeal, making it a cherished heirloom for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a distinct luster.
